attributes.action: Compensate those injured by covid vaccines for all medical costs and lost income
attributes.additional_details: We have no specialist healthcare or financial support that reflects the income we have lost. We are desperate to get better and some have and spent thousands on private treatments. I like many people had successful careers, but now have no income and zero specialist help or provision from the Government.
attributes.background: Reimburse any private medical expenses and loss of income directly incurred as a result of taking the covid vaccine, where ill health has been certified by doctors.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
